name: DGIT System Monitor - Minimal Mode
description: Read-only system status monitor without configuration capabilities - perfect for compliance dashboards and non-admin users

system_overview.name: System Status Monitor
system_overview.command: echo '╔═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗' && echo '║           DGIT SYSTEM STATUS MONITOR (READ-ONLY)              ║' && echo '╠═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣' && echo '║                                                               ║' && echo '║  System Information:                                          ║' && echo '║  ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────  ║' && echo -n '║  Hostname: ' && hostname && echo -n '║  User: ' && whoami && echo -n '║  Date: ' && date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S' && echo -n '║  Uptime: ' && uptime -p && echo '║                                                               ║' && echo '║  Domain Status:                                               ║' && echo '║  ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────  ║' && realm list 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'domain-name' && echo '║  ✓ System is joined to Active Directory domain                ║' && realm list 2>/dev/null | grep 'domain-name' || echo '║  ✗ System is NOT joined to any domain                         ║' && echo '║                                                               ║' && echo '║  Resource Usage:                                              ║' && echo '║  ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────  ║' && echo -n '║  Memory: ' && free -h | grep Mem | awk '{print $3 " / " $2 " (" int($3/$2*100) "% used)"}' && echo -n '║  Disk (/): ' && df -h / | tail -1 | awk '{print $3 " / " $2 " (" $5 " used)"}' && echo -n '║  CPU Load: ' && uptime | awk -F'load average:' '{print $2}' && echo '║                                                               ║' && echo '║  Network Status:                                              ║' && echo '║  ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────  ║' && ping -c 1 -W 2 8.8.8.8 >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo '║  ✓ Network connectivity: OK                                   ║' || echo '║  ✗ Network connectivity: FAILED                               ║' && echo '║                                                               ║' && echo '║  Services Status:                                             ║' && echo '║  ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────  ║' && echo -n '║  Active services: ' && systemctl list-units --type=service --state=running | grep -c '.service' && echo -n '║  Failed services: ' && systemctl list-units --type=service --state=failed | grep -c '.service' && echo '║                                                               ║' && echo '║  Security Status:                                             ║' && echo '║  ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────  ║' && sudo ufw status 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'Status: active' && echo '║  ✓ Firewall: Active                                           ║' || echo '║  ✗ Firewall: Inactive or not configured                       ║' && echo '║                                                               ║' && echo '║  Last System Check:' $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') '             ║' && echo '╚═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝' && echo '' && echo 'This is a read-only monitor. No configuration actions available.' && echo 'For system configuration, please use the full DGIT Configurator.'

optional_features.description: No optional features available in minimal mode
